snippet.title: Hero's Spirit - Trailer
snippet.description:
In Hero's Spirit, you embark on an adventure through a strange land. Your quest is to claim the power you need and foil the witch's plan to destroy the world. You'll overcome obstacles, uncover ancient secrets, and evade or defeat the monsters and minions that stand between you and your destiny.


Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/XDXK5c
Check us out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1186050/Heros_Spirit/
